details.sectionContent: A perfect stage for the automotive enthusiast to show their technical knowledge
Chance to acme and imposing all your automobile expertise and platform to showcase the prodigious journey of the best brand in the race this automobile.

In this round teams will have to indicate the maximum number of automobile parts from given picture of bikes and cars. Whoever indicates maximum number of parts in least amount of time will move to round 2.(50% to 60% teams will be eliminated)

details.sectionHeader: Round 2: ...and the war of knowledge begins
details.sectionContent: This is debate round in which the teams will have to defend their automobile against other. The automobile they get will depend on the message they recieve one day before the event. Half of the teams will be eliminated here and Round 1 score will be considered.

In this round, three blank pages will be given to each team. On the first page, they will have to draw a logo for the automobile of their dreams, on the next page, they will draw a rough 2D sketch of the car. And finally on the last page the participants will have to list out the general specifications of their dream car. Best five to six teams will be selected.
